Logger should be non-static field. Change this field (logger) to non-static field.
Header line doesn't match pattern ^ \* Copyright \(c\) 2010-2020 Contributors to the openHAB project$
Name 'logger' must match pattern '^[A-Z][A-Z0-9]*(_[A-Z0-9]+)*$'.
Illegal class is passed to LoggerFactory#getLogger(Class). It should be one of [org.openhab.binding.sonoff.internal.handler.SonoffDeviceState].
message.rule: Illegal class is passed to LoggerFactory#getLogger(Class) (SLF4J)

message.message: Illegal class is passed to LoggerFactory#getLogger(Class). It should be one of [org.openhab.binding.sonoff.internal.handler.SonoffRGBCCTHandler].
message.rule: Illegal class is passed to LoggerFactory#getLogger(Class) (SLF4J)
